Hero.subtitle: Vietnamese Tea Heritage
Hero.title: Essence of ancient tea
Hero.description: A journey back to the origin of taste from ancient Shan Tuyet tea trees living on misty mountain peaks, absorbing the essence of heaven and earth for centuries.

hero.title: Essence of Ancient Tea
hero.subtitle: A journey back to the origin of taste from ancient Shan Tuyet tea trees

Story.label: About 84tea
Story.headline: Awaken your taste buds with
Story.description1: 84tea was born with a mission to preserve and honor Vietnam's ancient tea trees. The number 84 is not just the country code, but a proud affirmation of the origin of these premium tea buds.
Story.description2: We travel along the S-shaped land, reaching rugged high mountains where ethnic minorities still protect ancient tea forests hundreds of years old day and night.

Featured.label: Collection
Featured.headline: Vietnamese Tea Masterpieces
Featured.description: Selected from the finest tea products from famous raw material regions.

Process.label: Process
Process.headline: From Mountain Peak to Tea Cup
Process.description: The journey of ancient tea buds through the hands of artisans and the tempering of time.
Process.step1Desc: Shan Tuyet tea buds with 1 bud and 2 leaves are harvested manually by local people in the early morning mist.
Process.step2Desc: The natural fermentation process lasts for decades in earthenware jars, awakening hidden flavors.
Process.step3Desc: Brew properly to fully feel the flavor of the mountains and forests and condensed time.

Benefits.item1Desc: No chemicals, no preservatives, growing completely naturally in the old forest.
Benefits.item2Desc: Each tea bud carries within it the cultural story of ethnic minorities.
Benefits.item3Desc: Recognized as a national product, meeting the strictest standards.
Benefits.item4Desc: Commitment to purchase at high prices, ensuring sustainable livelihoods for local people.

CTA.headline: Subscribe to Newsletter
CTA.description: Receive 10% off your first order and updates on interesting tea ceremony knowledge from 84tea.

Hero.label: About Us
Hero.title: The Story
Hero.desc: Bringing the essence of Vietnamese tea to the world, combining centuries-old traditions with modern fermentation technology.

Vision.label: Vision
Vision.title: Vietnamese Energy Tea
Vision.desc1: 84tea is not just a tea brand - it's a mission to bring Vietnamese tea culture to the world. We believe that Vietnam's ancient Shan Tuyet tea deserves to be recognized as one of Asia's most prestigious teas.
Vision.desc2: With our exclusive fermentation process, we create tea products that are not only delicious but also offer superior health benefits - true to the spirit of "Vietnamese Energy Tea".

nature.title: Natural Origin
nature.desc: All products come from 100+ year old Shan Tuyet ancient tea trees, grown at 1,500m altitude in Vietnam.

fermentation.title: Traditional Fermentation
fermentation.desc: Exclusive fermentation process preserves natural probiotics and maximizes health benefits.

energy.title: Sustainable Energy
energy.desc: Provides stable energy throughout the day without the jitters of coffee.

premium.title: Premium Positioning
premium.desc: Each product is a work of art, packaged with premium materials worthy of the value inside.

2020.title: Discovery
2020.desc: Found ancient Shan Tuyet tea area in Northwest highlands

2022.title: Research
2022.desc: Developed exclusive fermentation process with experts

2024.title: Launch
2024.desc: 3704 Co., LTD officially established, 84tea brand born

2026.title: Expansion
2026.desc: Tea room franchise and international market expansion

Hero.label: Partnership Opportunity
Hero.title: Partner with
Hero.description: Become a franchise partner of 84tea to spread the essence of Vietnamese ancient tea. Sustainable business model, attractive profits, and operated by a team of leading experts.

Benefits.label: Why Choose 84tea?
Benefits.title: Outstanding Competitive Advantage
Benefits.description: We don't just franchise the brand, we share the secret of success and accompany you on the path of sustainable business.

storefront.title: Flexible Model
storefront.description: Diverse scales from Kiosk to Premium Lounge, suitable for various investment levels and locations.

monitoring.title: Standardized Operation
monitoring.description: Operation, brewing, and service processes are 100% standardized, easy to train and manage.

soup_kitchen.title: Exclusive Material Source
soup_kitchen.description: Owning a distinct ancient tea material region, ensuring quality and the most stable price in the market.

campaign.title: Comprehensive Marketing
campaign.description: Support multi-channel communication, periodic branding and promotion campaigns from the headquarters.

school.title: In-depth Training
school.description: Training programs from basic to advanced for investors and staff on tea ceremony and management.

engineering.title: 24/7 Technical Support
engineering.description: IT and technical team always ready to support POS systems, management apps, and equipment maintenance.

Models.title: Diverse Investment Options
Models.description: 3 models optimized for each market segment and financial capability.

Process.label: Partnership Process
Process.title: 5-Step Roadmap to Success
Process.description: Streamlined, transparent process helps you own an 84tea store in just 15-30 days.

01.title: Register for Advice
01.description: Fill in the registration form. Our specialists will contact you within 24h.

02.title: Survey & Contract
02.description: Survey premises, advise on suitable models, and sign franchise contracts.

03.title: Design & Construction
03.description: Create 3D design drawings and construct the store according to Indochine Luxury standards.

04.title: Training & Setup
04.description: Train personnel, setup machinery, raw materials, and operating procedures.

05.title: Grand Opening
05.description: Support opening organization, run ads, and officially go into operation.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to 84tea. By accessing and using the website 84tea.com, you agree to comply with the terms and conditions stated in this document.

company.address: Address: 134 Nguyen Hoang Ton, Phu Thuong, Tay Ho, Hanoi

products.title: 3. Products and Services
products.content: 84tea provides premium tea products from Vietnamese ancient Shan Tuyet tea trees. All products are manufactured according to food safety standards with clear origin.

orders.title: 4. Orders and Payment
items: Orders are confirmed after successful payment
Shipping fees are calculated separately based on delivery address

returns.title: 6. Returns and Refunds
